name: Round and Round (Unity Learn FPS Creator Kit Level)
name_original: Round and Round (Unity Learn FPS Creator Kit Level)
description:
This game level was made with the Unity Creator Kit: FPS, as part of a https://learn.unity.com/live-calendar series.  I put it up on itch.io only so that I could link to it from there... though of course anyone can download it and play it if they want to.

To play the game, just unzip the file and click on the executable file in the folder.
